entry.title: RT shawnpang.eth: Re @hey_bernie @vinci_dao I think @developer_dao has one of the best on-boarding experience I’ve ever had with DAOs. The first a fe...
entry.summary: RT shawnpang.eth Re @hey_bernie @vinci_dao I think @developer_dao has one of the best on-boarding experience I’ve ever had with DAOs. The first a few days of on-boarding new members is very important because they tend to get overwhelmed. Provide a clear guidance, a group oboarding call, and single point of contact.
